Prompt GPT like this: ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre a creative strategist at a leading D2C agency. Based on this concept, product, angle, and persona, give me 3‚Äì5 Veo 3-style hooks for Meta ads.‚Äù

You‚Äôll want to input:
‚Üí Brand
‚Üí Product + benefit
‚Üí Core angle
‚Üí Character/persona
‚Üí A script or framework link

The ideas that come back should be bold, movement-heavy visuals. Think strong setups, pattern-interrupts, cinematic energy.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Pick your favourite idea and convert it into JSON

Once ChatGPT gives you options, choose one and prompt it again: ‚ÄúTurn this into a Veo 3 JSON script format, but don‚Äôt generate until I approve.‚Äù

JSON works better than freeform text in Veo 3. That JSON format includes everything:

‚Üí Camera type
‚Üí Shot movement
‚Üí Character detail
‚Üí Lighting and style
‚Üí Dialogue tone
‚Üí Constraints (no logos, no text, no music)

- Always choose V3 Fast, 10p per shot, faster, more output
- Quality mode is slower and haven‚Äôt seen any major benefits when A/B testing

6Ô∏è‚É£ Repeat
Use learnings from your account to test both absurd hooks (spoon on a rollercoaster) and realistic ones (whiteboard explainer).
